activities: Information is received as part of user registrations for online auctions, in advance of a scheduled event. Users elect to register in order to participate in a live auction and agree to terms specified.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Name, Address, Phone, e-mail, and Credit Card (used for authorization only and identity verification through Chase PaymenTech)
